title: AI not a 'straightforward' fix for ailing productivity
description: Artificial intelligence has been touted as a tonic to Australia's slumped productivity, but an expert warns the technology might not offer an easy solution.
content:

title: China restricts AI across the country to prevent kids cheating, America could learn from it
description: China now turns off AI functions for the whole country during exam periods. The CCP knows that their youth is learning less when they use artificial intelligence. Meanwhile, American students are using AI as a crutch and missing out on valuable learning experiences as a result.
content:
China now turns off AI for the whole country during exam weeks.
That’s because the Chinese Communist Party knows their youth learn less when they use artificial intelligence. Surely, President Xi Jinping is reveling in this leg up over American stude... [5744 chars]
